Gold

Name:Gold
Formula:Au
Atomic Number:79
Group:11
Block:d
Atomic Mass:196.967
Discovery Date:Approx. 3000BC
Appearance:A soft metal with a characteristic yellow colour.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Gold Bars
  • Coinage
Gold can be found beneath the earth on all seven continents.
